name: Frozen Up Ninja
description:
This is pretty much the first game I've ever made. Part of MGSA online game jam.

Premise

You are Master Yoshimoto. You have just lost a battle against your arch-rival (again) who has frozen you in a block of ice.

Fortunately, your ninja magic (or "ninjutsu" if you're being fancy) allows you to still move around.

Your only hope of survival now is to reach the fire on the other side of the valley and melt yourself free.

Controls

Movement = left & right arrow keys

Jump = space

Slow down objects = F
